title: Temporary transit accommodation shall be provided within DNA
clause_text: Temporary transit accommodation shall be provided within DNA. If it falls on the area of amenity open space excluding D P road/open space reservation in accordance with the procedure laid down underRegulation No. 4 of 33(10) (A).
